result.eng: We deal with enquiries from the public.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobal
result.orig: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobal
result.html: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobalWe deal with enquiries from the public.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúċáin ón ṗobalWe deal with enquiries from the public.

result.eng: The team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ga: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.orig: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.html: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ponchtml: I nGaeilge aṁáin a ḃeiḋ an ḟoireann ag plé le gaċ gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.

result.ga: Is ábhar le plé é seo
result.orig: Is ábhar le plé é seo
result.html: Is ábhar le plé é seoThis is open to discussion.
result.ponchtml: Is áḃar le plé é seoThis is open to discussion.

result.eng: I hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís

result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
